alert.note: Alert for Gila; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:19PM MST until July 22 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST FOR GILA AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES... At 419 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Oxbow Estates, or 11 miles southwest of Payson, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Gila and Yavapai Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
